attributes.action: Lower the Penalty Charge Notice amount for all PCO drivers in London.
attributes.background:
I am writing this petition today to get the Mayor of London and TFL to reduce the normal rate of £65/130 to a much more reasonable price for tickets that are issued to private hire drivers in London.

We have it bad enough as it is with other costs and feel that this would benefit everyone.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. It's the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
